file_content.text: Sublevel four open. No guards. Hmph. So close to a new kill record....
We should've canceled her mission when the Commander disappeared. She's unstable.
She's ahead of schedule. And the casualties are acceptable.
So glad to have your support.
The relay station is only three levels away. Be prepared to slice the GEMINI frequency the moment you're inside.
She terrorized our home, and we let her go back....
It's not too late for Havoc Squad to finish this op right. Demolish the whole facility.
Over your dead body.
Or yours. Let's not be picky.
Enough. Kaliyo may be a homicidal lunatic... but she's my homicidal lunatic.
Don't threaten my assassin.
Where the blazes have you been?
Valkorion dragged me into the wilderness and almost killed me. Then, he left my mind to go... somewhere else. He wouldn't say.
It's a long story. Listen...
I ran into Satele Shan and the ghost of Darth Marr. They helped me build my own lightsaber.
That's an awful lie. It must be true.
Blast it. Skytroopers. At least a dozen. Almost ran right into them.
Don't panic. Maybe they didn't see you.
If they did, things are about to get excit--
Kaliyo, come in. Come in. No signal.
We need a contingency plan. If they capture her, turn her against us...
We can't evacuate Odessen. We just finished decorating the place.
I warned you this would happen. We're going in.
Stand down. We're not doing anything until we know more.
Stop and wait for my orders.
It's not your call. You abandoned your post. Now I have to clean up the mess.
I sent Kaliyo on this mission for a reason. Let her work.
Kaliyo has my confidence.
Recon team gave the all-clear. We're entering sublevel four.
Five by five, Major. Transmitting optimal path to the next security checkpoint....
Try not to shoot everything this time. There are only so many storage lockers to put Skytroopers in.
That's half the challenge. What kind of Sith are you?
I've identified the hyperwave relay station's weak points. Demolition charges at each one will maximize the blast radius.
You want to destroy our best chance to take control of the Eternal Fleet. Unbelievable. I feel my IQ dropping just hearing you talk.
Maybe you'll forget how to breathe.
Your mission's complete. Get off this channel--and my planet.
Enough. Havoc Squad needs radio silence to do its job.
Don't distract Major Jorgan.
If I were an assassin droid, you'd all be dead.
No one saw me enter? Really?
I don't remember promoting you to Commander before I left.
I give the orders here, Senya.
I found Satele Shan with the spirit of Darth Marr. They helped me build a new lightsaber to defeat Arcann.
I'll give you a full report later. Tell me what I've missed.
Focus on the mission at hand.
Everything. We had to improvise without you.
You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
The truth won't make sense.
I thought we were past keeping secrets from each other.
That doesn't mean you don't have to tell us!
This is our only chance to disable the Fleet. I love you, but I have to go.
Kaliyo had her chance. It's your turn, Major.
Go. You have my authorization.
This doesn't let you off the hook for going AWOL again. I can't keep losing you. Havoc Squad, move out!
We won't let you down, Commander. Havoc Squad, move out!
Hold up. We've got trouble. A dozen Knights coming in behind us.
Someone found your mess on level nineteen.
If that was true, there'd be twice as many--
Major? Major, come in. We've lost the signal.
We could salvage the mission--if we send our backup.
She isn't backup. She's collateral damage.
Hold on, Senya--the Knights might kill her for us....
I'd rather ask forgiveness than permission, but I don't need either of them. I'm halfway through level ten. Consider the mission complete.
I'm giving you a direct order. Stay where you are until I say otherwise.
Stop! Don't you dare!
After everything we've shared, you still think I listen. That's adorable. I'll call you.
I'm sorry, your signal's breaking up. It does that when I switch off the holocomm. Wish me luck.
Understood and approved. Do whatever you have to.
Proceed with caution, Kaliyo.
Carbonite made you soft. How ironic. Don't wait up--it's going to be a long night.
Always do. Oh, look--things to shoot. Be seeing you....
Oh, and I'm Force-sensitive now.
They're a team, now. Following the will of the Force.
Satele Shan and the ghost of Darth Marr have been here on Odessen the whole time. They found me in the wilderness.
My mother's here? With Darth Marr?
Not anymore. They left on some other mission--but not before revealing what it'll take to stop Arcann. It's... complicated.
